content: you will be working on the rs use the chart on the next page to cut the leather handle only which is outside of the basket pieces out of the leather trim and to punch holes for the leather cord cut four pieces of 2mm leather cord each 6 round 1 first needle *wyib sl 1 p1 repeat from * to end long to attach the handles as shown in the pictures below second needle *wyib sl 1 p1 repeat from * to end round 2 first needle *p1 wyib sl 1 repeat from * to end pick up 2 sts from the knitted fabric next to your last st second needle *p1 wyib sl 1 repeat from * to end pick up 2 from the knitted fabric next to your last st it is not important how exactly the stitches are picked up but it should be done in a consistent manner and in a way 3 © 2025 after 9 to 5 all rights reserved pattern for personal use only 4 © 2025 after 9 to 5 all rights reserved pattern for personal use only
